original_text: In the four corners of the outer court were enclosed courts, forty cubits long and thirty cubits wide; each of the courts in the four corners was the same size.
korean_text: 뜰의 네 구석 안에는 집이 있으니 길이는 마흔 척이요 너비는 서른 척이라 구석의 네 뜰이 같은 크기며

sentences.original_text: In the four corners of the outer court
forty cubits long and thirty cubits wide
sentences.korean_translation: 길이는 사십 규빗이요 너비는 삼십 규빗이며

sentences.original_text: each of the courts in the four corners
